text: geuga neohuiwa ihonhanda hayeo do junimkkeseoneun neohuiboda deo na-eun bu-indeullo neohui jalileul daechehayeo jusini geunyeodeul-eun boda sunjonghago mid-eum-e chungsilhamyeo heonsinhago hoegaeha myeo gyeobsonhago mid-eum-eul wihae ijuha myeo dansighaneun gihon-ui yeoseong-igeona mihon yeoseongdeul-ila
